name: Dinner Tonight: Roast Chicken with Saffron and Lemons
description: Honestly, there isn't much in this Saveur recipe to differentiate it from a fairly standard roast chicken. Lemon and rosemary are customary, as is the straight 400°F cooking method. You know, and that's fine. As long as there is a...

recipeInstructions.text: Place the saffron on a non-stick skillet set over medium heat. Toast for 1 minute. Remove and mix with the salt and black peppercorns. Grind in a mortar and pestle or a spice grinder.
Place the chicken in a roasting pan and set in the oven. Cook for 1 hour.
